TheAlchemist:BagOfBricks.NAME: Bag Of Bricks
TheAlchemist:BagOfBricks.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times the number of potions you have.

TheAlchemist:ChippedStone.NAME: Chipped Stone
TheAlchemist:ChippedStone.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you gain an thealchemist:Element, return this from your discard pile to your Hand.

TheAlchemist:FireStrike.NAME: Fire Strike
TheAlchemist:FireStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 thealchemist:Fire thealchemist:Element.

TheAlchemist:Prohibition.NAME: Prohibition
TheAlchemist:Prohibition.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you don't have potions. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you don't have potions.

TheAlchemist:Recipes.NAME: Recipes
TheAlchemist:Recipes.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage for every !M! cards you have.

TheAlchemist:ShiftingSand.NAME: Shifting Sand
TheAlchemist:ShiftingSand.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you deal blocked damage, gain 1 thealchemist:Earth thealchemist:Element. NL If you deal unblocked damage, gain 1 thealchemist:Fire thealchemist:Element.

TheAlchemist:Wildfire.NAME: Wildfire
TheAlchemist:Wildfire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain 1 thealchemist:Fire thealchemist:Element for each enemy in combat. NL Exhaust.
TheAlchemist:Wildfire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain 1 thealchemist:Fire thealchemist:Element for each enemy in combat.

TheAlchemist:BlackHole.NAME: Black Hole
TheAlchemist:BlackHole.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 card. NL Gain 2 thealchemist:Dark thealchemist:Elements. NL Exhaust.

TheAlchemist:CautiousBrew.NAME: Cautious Brew
TheAlchemist:CautiousBrew.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain !M! thealchemist:Earth thealchemist:Elements. NL Otherwise gain !M! thealchemist:Fire thealchemist:Elements.

TheAlchemist:CleansingLight.NAME: Cleansing Light
TheAlchemist:CleansingLight.DESCRIPTION: Discard your last potion. NL Gain 1 thealchemist:Light thealchemist:Element.
TheAlchemist:CleansingLight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard your last potion. NL Gain 2 thealchemist:Light thealchemist:Elements.

TheAlchemist:Explosion.NAME: Explosion
TheAlchemist:Explosion.DESCRIPTION: Gain X thealchemist:Fire thealchemist:Elements. NL Exhaust.
TheAlchemist:Explosion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain X+1 thealchemist:Fire thealchemist:Elements. NL Exhaust.

TheAlchemist:Gust.NAME: Gust
TheAlchemist:Gust.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! thealchemist:Air thealchemist:Element. NL Draw 1 card.
TheAlchemist:Gust.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! thealchemist:Air thealchemist:Elements. NL Draw 1 card.

TheAlchemist:PackedEarth.NAME: Packed Earth
TheAlchemist:PackedEarth.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack this turn, gain 1 thealchemist:Earth thealchemist:Element.
TheAlchemist:PackedEarth.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack this turn, gain 1 thealchemist:Earth thealchemist:Element and gain !M! Block.

TheAlchemist:Reagent.NAME: Reagent
TheAlchemist:Reagent.DESCRIPTION: Gain an thealchemist:Element you already have. NL Exhaust.

TheAlchemist:SearingLight.NAME: Searing Light
TheAlchemist:SearingLight.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 thealchemist:Fire thealchemist:Element. NL Gain 1 thealchemist:Light thealchemist:Element.
TheAlchemist:SearingLight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 thealchemist:Fire thealchemist:Element. NL Gain 1 thealchemist:Light thealchemist:Element. NL Gain 1 thealchemist:Fire thealchemist:Element.

TheAlchemist:ToxicBrew.NAME: Toxic Brew
TheAlchemist:ToxicBrew.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL Gain 1 thealchemist:Water thealchemist:Element.

TheAlchemist:Transmute.NAME: Transmute
TheAlchemist:Transmute.DESCRIPTION: Transform a card in your hand. NL Exhaust.

TheAlchemist:Trenches.NAME: Trenches
TheAlchemist:Trenches.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 1 thealchemist:Earth thealchemist:Element.

TheAlchemist:WaterBubble.NAME: Water Bubble
TheAlchemist:WaterBubble.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 1 thealchemist:Water thealchemist:Element.

TheAlchemist:HunkerDown.NAME: Hunker Down
TheAlchemist:HunkerDown.DESCRIPTION: Gain 99 NoBlock. NL At the start of your turn, gain 1 thealchemist:Earth thealchemist:Element.

TheAlchemist:SacredForm.NAME: Sacred Form
TheAlchemist:SacredForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Double the effectiveness of the first potion you play each turn.
TheAlchemist:SacredForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Double the effectiveness of the first potion you play each turn.
